meanings.definition: A religious song or poem typically praising God or a deity.
meanings.sent1: During the church service, we sang beautiful hymns.
meanings.sent2: The choir performed hymns at the Sunday morning service.
meanings.sent3: The birds outside seemed to chirp their own hymns to the rising sun.
meanings.sent4: The hymns of nature echoed through the peaceful valley.
meanings.sent5: The old hymns brought a sense of peace and comfort to the listeners.

meanings.sent1: We often hymn together during family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The congregation hymns joyfully every Sunday.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to hymn loudly in the car on the way to school.
meanings.sent4: As the group hiked, they would hymn to keep their spirits high.
meanings.sent5: The friends gathered around the campfire to hymn their favorite tunes.
